text: "Every Morning" is a 1999 song by Sugar Ray and is the leading single from third studio album 14:59. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 3 in the United States, number 24 in Ireland, number 21 in Iceland, number 1 in Canada and number 17 in New Zealand and Australia. It was first released in Japan. ==Track listings== US 7-inch, CD, and cassette single # "Every Morning" – 3:39 # "Even Though" – 2:35 UK, European, Australian, and Japanese CD single # "Every Morning" – 3:39 # "Rivers" – 2:50 # "Aim for Me" (main version) – 2:29 ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Sugar Ray songs
title: Every Morning (Sugar Ray song)
